title: Light Breaker
description:
Light Breaker is a fun mobile game made for android devices. 
I worked in the game as a programmer since the beginning of the project.

title: SUPER MARIO MANIA
description:
This game is a remake for the most iconic levels in the Super Mario franchise.


Controls:

Move: arrow keys / gamepad( joystic)k

Accept: space bar / gamepad (A)

Pause: enter / gamepad (start)

Jump: spacebar / gamepad (A)

Throw Cappy: Q/ gamepad (X)

Sprint: S/ gamepad (L2)

Dive: D/ gamepad (R2)

title: My Porfolio
description:
This portfolio contains all the informations you need regarding my skills, freelance experiences and projects. 
It was built using HTML, CSS, JavaSript and VueJS.

title: Portfolio Projects Manager
description:
It's a desktop application that allows me to add, delete or modify projects for my portfolio.
It generates a JSON file that contains all projects. And an Image folder that contains all the projects images.

title: Yui-chan loves her chicken
description:
Explore this abandoned site with Yui-chan and her cute chicken. Fight monsters and boss to level up your health and stamina. Yui-chan can't attack while carrying her chicken, so make sure to put it down to fight. But watch out, monsters target the chicken so protect it, because Yui-chan and her chicken share the same HP.

This Game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

title: I did NOT want that card!
description:
In this rogue like , you can't choose your equipment, In fact it's picked randomly form a deck of cards.

This game was made for the GMTK Game jam 2020
